reviewtext: I wasn't looking for the best Canon lens since I'm new to the DSLR game. With $169 I can take some nice nature and sports pictures. If I ever learn more it will be worth inxesting to what is advertised as a better lens of this type. The particular lens is clear and brings things closer as described. No defects. I recommend it to anyone who wants to just bring themes closer without going pro or braking the bank.
summary: Does what it's supposed to do
